PathOfBuilding.Notes:
https://www.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/h8i8t0/the_benefits_to_consuming_corpses_can_be_many/
I played that this league, first time I got to 100. It was incredible. VoliDead Spellslinger is going to be my new go to. Does insane DPS as is, I was dropping Elder in less than 3 seconds. Made the Sirus fight more manageable than ED too.
I can't wait to play this now and lag my friends even more now. Another 7~8 VoliDead balls with more damage?! Yes please! Haha
